1.title: Sze Yap Bot Help Pages!
1.name: Sze Yap Taishanese Dictionary Bot
1.value:
Hello there! It's me, Do-En! I'm a dictionary bot based on [Gene Chin's Hoisanva English Dictionary](https://sites.fitnyc.edu/users/gene_chin/hed/index.htm) and [Stephen Li's Taishanese Dictionary](https://stephen-li.com/WebTemplates/greencreative/taishanese.html)
React with the arrows to see the commands!
You can also use commands in a DM channel with the bot!

If you are still confused after reading this guide or want to talk join the [Du-Ein support server!](https://discord.gg/mbw7rZkPG4)

Special thanks to [suspiciouscactus](https://github.com/suspiciouscactus) for an extract of Stephen Li's dictionary.
This bot is inspired by Kaoffie's Yulin Bot! [Go check out their github!](https://github.com/Kaoffie)

2.title: Help Commands
2.name: `{prefix}gc word`
2.value:
Use {prefix}gc ***word*** to search [Gene Chin's Hoisanva English Dictionary](https://sites.fitnyc.edu/users/gene_chin/hed/index.htm)
__Examples:__
English Search: {prefix}gc dictionary
Chinese Search: {prefix}gc 字典, {prefix}gc 樂
Pinyin Search: {prefix}gc lok32 (only supports single word search)

3.title: Help Commands
3.name: `{prefix}sl word`
3.value:
Use {prefix}sl ***word*** to search [Stephen Li's Taishanese Dictionary](https://stephen-li.com/WebTemplates/greencreative/taishanese.html)
__Examples:__
English Search: {prefix}sl break
Chinese Search: {prefix}sl 樂

4.title: Help Commands
4.name: `{prefix}penyim word`
4.value:
Use {prefix}penyim ***word*** to convert chinese characters to penyim
__Examples:__
{prefix}penyim 可以嗎

5.title: Help Commands
5.name: `{prefix}leave_channel`
5.value: Use {prefix}leave_channel to tell the bot to leave the channel you are currently in

6.title: Help Commands
6.name: `{prefix}pause`
6.value:
Pause audio that is currently playing
Requires you be in the same vc as the bot

7.title: Help Commands
7.name: `{prefix}hoisan_sauce`
7.value: Play a random hoisan sauce youtube video! use +pause to stop the audio!

8.title: Help Commands
8.name: `{prefix}adminhelp`
8.value: See a list of all the admin commands. Requires you to have admin priviledges. I mean, if u reeeaaaalllly want to see them you can invite Sze Yap Bot to your own server with [this link](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=846977182383210506&permissions=1345637440&scope=bot)

9.title: Picture Credits
9.name: Most of the pictures provided by Ace Dystopia#2150!

10.title: Sze Yap Bot
10.name: Sze Yap Bot created by pigpigchui#0753
10.value:
[Source code on Github](https://github.com/cheap-ghetto/Sze_Yap_bot)

Want to help me out? [Upvote Sze-Yap_Bot!](https://discordbotlist.com/bots/sze-yap-bot/upvote)

1.title: Sze Yap Bot Admin Help Commands
1.name: Help commands for welcome message config
1.value:
`{prefix}setwcmsg` *[your message]*
sets welcome msg for when member joins
Use `{{user}}` to mention *user* and `{{membernum}}` to display their *member number* in the welcome message

{prefix}`setentitle` *[your title]*
sets title for banner when member joins

{prefix}`setchtitle` *[your ch title]*
sets ch title below english one

{prefix}`setwcchannel` *[#your_channel]*
sets the welcome msgs are sent to

{prefix}`delwcmsg`
deletes configured welcome message

{prefix}`sendwcmsg` *[true/false or on/off]*
turn welcome message on or off

{prefix}`showpfp` *[true/false]*
toggle showing pfp of member on banner

{prefix}`hoisanwcpics` *[true/false]*
toggle using pics from Hoisan or random pictures for the welcome banner

{prefix}`title_colour` *[red/green/blue/yellow/white/green/255, 255, 255 <- This is rgb value]*
set text colour for welcome banner

2.title: Sze Yap Bot Admin Help Commands
2.name: Help commands for role message config
2.value:
Base command: `{prefix}rolepage`

`pages`
displays all role pages

`send` *[channel]* *[page name]*
sends the role message with reactions

`allroles`
configure the message to allow access to all roles

`send_allroles` *[channel]*
send the message in the indicated channel for the message to react to for all roles

`add` *[role]* *[page name]*
add a role to a page and specify emoji

`remove page` *[page name]*
removes the whole role page

`remove role` *[role]* *[page name]*
removes a role from a page
